definition: the activity of putting something in written form
details:
noun
- the activity of putting something in written form
= example: the activity of putting something in written form
- the act of creating written works
= example: the act of creating written works
= synonyms: authorship
- letters or symbols that are written or imprinted on a surface to represent the sounds or words of a language
= example: letters or symbols that are written or imprinted on a surface to represent the sounds or words of a language
- the work of a writer
= synonyms: written material, piece of writing
- (usually plural) the collected work of an author
= example: (usually plural) the collected work of an author
